name: MiningTools_Update
title: Mining Tools (+dynamites to provide new resources) 1.1 Update
author: BinbinHfr, (adrian_05 1.1 Update)
description: Tools to speed up your mining (pneumatic drills & fast mining drills), provide new resources (with dynamite or massive water injection) and even erase resources (with dynamite). I did not create this mod, I only updated it to the new version
